name: Droid Invaders
description:
Droid Invaders is a tower defense strategy game. Your mission is to stop revolting droids from reaching your energy sources. Droids live underground, and nobody has figured out why they are suddenly drawn to the surface. Is there a mastermind behind this?HIDE YOUR SHINY THINGS
Droids love shiny things. Energy sources are excessively shiny, and having reached the surface that's what most droids are moving towards. Luckily, you have a large arsenal of upgradeable defensive towers. These towers use laser beams, shock waves, fire and many other weapons to fight off droids. You can also trick the curious robots by building shiny decoy towers - they're irresistible, droids can't help but investigate them.BE STRATEGIC
Your resources are limited. Make smart use of them and decide well where and when to place defense towers. Many droids have unique abilites, they can repair each other, cloak themselves, teleport or fly across your line of defense. Even though the game happens in real-time, you can pause the gameplay whenever you want and take your next actions while time is frozen.UNCOVER THE TRUTH
As you play through the campaign, you slowly gain insight into what caused this invasion. The world of Droid Invaders is not black and white, and during the game you will begin to question whose side you're actually on.
